label: Bars
short_description: Long metal rods designed to hold weight plates for compound movements.

label: Free-Weights
short_description: Resistance tools that move freely in any plane of motion.

label: Bodyweight
short_description: Using the user's own mass as the primary source of resistance.

label: Machines
short_description: Equipment with a fixed or constrained path of motion.

label: Cable
short_description: Resistance provided via a pulley and cable system for constant tension.

label: Functional
short_description: Odd-object or movement-based equipment used for real-world strength.

label: Other
short_description: Loading tools or resistance methods not covered by standard categories.
